intro.paragraph1: Orbital Temple ye sateliti ye min ka cidenyabaara ye seko ni dɔnko ye : hakilijigin ye sankolo la min dabɔra hakilitigi bɛɛ ye min sigilen bɛ Dugukolo kan walima min ye ɲɛnamaya kɛ Dugukolo kan.
intro.paragraph2: Fɛnɲɛnɛmako fɛɛrɛw sababu fɛ, mɔgɔ o mɔgɔ bɛ se ka mɔgɔ tɔgɔ ci Alabatosoba la, mɔgɔ min tɛmɛna, mɔgɔ min ɲɛnama don kosɛbɛ, walima danfɛn o danfɛn min ka kan ka to mɔgɔw hakili la.

sculpture.heading: Sculpture (Jɛkulu min bɛ wele ko Sculpture).
sculpture.paragraph1: O seko ni dɔnko baara in bɛ ni fɛn saba ye minnu bɛ tali kɛ ɲɔgɔn na: sateliti min dabɔra kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnenya la walasa ka tɔgɔ miliyari caman mara; foroba ja dɔ min bɛ kunnafoniw falenfalen ni sateliti ye; ani siti dɔ min sababu fɛ lajɛdenw bɛ tɔgɔw ci, k’a ta sisan fo ka se u tɛmɛnen ma, sankolo la.
sculpture.paragraph2: I n’a fɔ baara caman kɛli, Orbital Temple bɛ se ka jate yɔrɔ kɛrɛnkɛrɛnnen ja ye, yɔrɔ min sigilen bɛ yɔrɔ la. O fana ye Artsat ka porozɛ ye.

antenna.heading: Antenna I n'a fɔ Foroba Ja
antenna.paragraph1: Antɛni min b’an ni kɛnɛyako cɛsiri.
antenna.paragraph2: Antɛni dɔ bɛ ka labɛn min bɛna kɛ kumaɲɔgɔnya tilennen na ni sateliti orbital ye.
antenna.paragraph3: Ni sanu ye min bɛ yeelen bɔ, min bɛ sankolo jira a san fɛ, o ye daminɛyɔrɔ ye jamanadenw lawulili la (walima an ni min bɛ ‘sanfɛ yen’ cɛsira).
antenna.paragraph4: Hali n’a y’a sɔrɔ ja ninnu ma sigi diɲɛ yɔrɔ fanba la, an ka Frames from Earth, n’olu bɛ sateliti kɔlɔsi sisan, olu bɛ ka tɔgɔw ci tɛmɛsira kelen-kelen bɛɛ la.
antenna.paragraph5: Aw ye dɛmɛ don ka na ni nin yelifɛn in ye aw ka dugu kɔnɔ — ka antɛni ja dɔw sigi sen kan minnu bɛ barow bila senkan sanfɛla ɲinini, seko ni dɔnko, ani an ka yɔrɔ jɛlen kan diɲɛ kɔnɔ. Aw ye kunnafoni wɛrɛw sɔrɔ poroze dɛmɛni kan .

imageCaptions.riseNy: Orbital Temple min bɛ sankolo la. 3D jirali kɛra RiseNY&Partners fɛ.
imageCaptions.mercosul:
Orbital Temple sigili Mercosul Biennial la, Porto Alegre, Berezil jamana na.
Ja min bɔra Clara Marques fɛ.
